personal.name: John Doe
personal.title: Frontend Developer
personal.bio: Frontend Developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences

paragraphs: I'm a passionate Frontend Developer with 5+ years of experience creating responsive, user-friendly web applications. I specialize in React, Next.js, and modern CSS frameworks.

My journey in web development started at University of Technology where I earned my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. Since then, I've worked with startups and established companies to build products that users love.
When I'm not coding, you can find me hiking, reading sci-fi novels, or experimenting with new technologies.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured online store with cart, checkout, and payment integration.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A productivity app for teams with real-time updates and collaboration features.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A custom portfolio site for a photographer with gallery and booking system.
